skyux_avatar_error_not_image_description._description: Message description displayed when the user attempts to upload an avatar file that is not a valid image
skyux_avatar_error_not_image_description.message: Please choose a file that is a valid image.

skyux_avatar_error_not_image_title._description: Message title displayed when the user attempts to upload an avatar file that is not a valid image

skyux_avatar_error_too_large_description._description: Message description displayed when the user attempts to upload an avatar image with a file size that is too large
skyux_avatar_error_too_large_description.message: Please choose an image that is less than {0}.

skyux_avatar_error_too_large_title._description: Message title displayed when the user attempts to upload an avatar image with a file size that is too large

skyux_avatar_errormodal_ok._description: Text used on the primary button to dismiss the error modal.

skyux_avatar_inner_description._description: Accessibility info text for screen readers when using an avatar image

skyux_avatar_upload_change_aria_label._description: Accessibility text for when an avatar image can be changed.
skyux_avatar_upload_change_aria_label.message: Change profile photo of {0}. Drag a file here or click to browse.

skyux_avatar_upload_new_aria_label._description: Accessibility text for when a new avatar image can be added.
skyux_avatar_upload_new_aria_label.message: Add profile photo of {0}. Drag a file here or click to browse.
